quote_last: Vance cocked the Pakistani’s Uzi and trained it on the door, not sure what to do. The fear was that he might inadvertently kill a friendly. Hostage situations always presented that harrowing possibility. Quick identifications and quick decisions were what made good antiterrorist teams. He was afraid he had neither skill. He wasn’t even that great a shot.
title: Project Cyclops
author: Thomas Hoover
